entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grand Bank
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:17 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 11:30 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries or rain showers beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then southeast 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers changing to rain in the evening. Fog patches developing in the evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
